1. §1registerDevice(deviceItemStack, deviceName)§0:
Register the custon device.

2. §1createAppRegistryBuilder(appName):
§0Create the registryBuilder according to the app name (found in the store app).

3. §1isDefaultApp(default):
§0Make it as a default app.

4. §1battery(euTier, cost):
§0Set battery requirements for all tier.

5. §1battery(appTier, euTier, cost):
§0Set battery requirements for the specific tier.

6. §1device(deviceName...):
§0Set device requirements for all tier. (available by default: "scanner", "wireless", "camera", "solar_lv").

7. §1device(appTier, device...):
§0Set device requirements for the specific tier.

8. §1upgrade(upgradeItemStack...):
§0Set upgrade requirements for all tier.

9. §1upgrade(appTier, upgradeItemStack...):
§0Set upgrade requirements for the specific tier.

10. §1build():
§0finish and register.
